TopicTitle: [0.90] LazTek SpaceX Launch, Exploration, Colonial Transporter & Historic mods (1/25/14)

Articles.Content: I just downloaded this mod and it won't let me attach the middle engine to the first stage. Is it because it's not updated or am I doing something wrong?
It's always been a little fiddly use the included .craft.
will this ever be updated to 1.0.4 or higher status?
Laz hasnt posted since May draw a conclusion from that he must be very busy wiith RL

It's always been a little fiddly use the included .craft.

Ok thanks I'll try again. I didn't know there was an included craft I'll look for it.
Laz where are u ?
one of the best looking mod for this game... it's dead and I was waiting for an update since1.0.2

32 minutes ago, GERULA said:

one of the best looking mod for this game... it's dead and I was waiting for an update since1.0.2

This mod was really easy to update to every version ever since .90. But now with 1.0.5 and 1.1, this mod is not updateable due to the game requiring all models to have convex colliders. As far as I know, this mod has concave colliders for some of its parts, such as interstages and fairings. So without the original files, there is no way of changing the colliders from concave to convex (as far as I know).
Lazarus Luan uploaded a video to YouTube this morning with testing of a Laztek Spacex pack update to 1.05, but then deleted it, what does it mean?

Well I for one want to cast my 2 cents.

This is probably one of the best parts packs out there. I play with over 60 mods and this is still one that is on my list of "worth waiting for" The hint that Lazarus is still tinkering with it is something to look forward to. When he is ready to unleash his "Awesomeness" to the world. I for one will be waiting

3 hours ago, NerdMC said:

This is a cool mod. To bad its not up to date.

 

You should check out Kartoffelkuchen's Launchers Pack. It has the Falcon 1, Falcon 9 v1.1, and the Falcon 9 v1.1 Full Thrust, as well as an Atlas V. It also includes an ASDS and a Landing Zone 1 so you can land the booster back at the launch site or on a barge.

ok, so ive just installed this mod and im having some hard time with it. it looks awesome and all, but when i try to timewarp, the game really slows down to like 2-10 fps. i have an i5 processor running @3,4 Ghz, 8 gigs of RAM and Radeon r9 so i think PC should handle it. processor doesnt seem to be trying very hard its running @ 25% or something.. when im not timewarping it seems to be running fine. also, timewarp works fine with stock ships. i dont have ANY other addon installed. any ideas?

edit; ive tried both medium and low resolution mod.

Edited March 11, 2016 by Abruptum
